item.description: We meet every other Sunday at 11am in Brookline. The kids all speak Russian - we play games, read, work on art projects, listen to music, stage plays, visit the park and Boston's museums, etc. If your child is 5-8 yrs.old and you would like to join us, write to: russianplaygroup@hotmail.com

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: Russian Playgroup of Brookline/Newton for kids 5-8 yrs.old
